REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1552 reute r f BC-I.R.E.-<IF>-FILES-SUI 03-31 0073

TEXT.TITLE: I.R.E. <IF> FILES SUIT OVER SHARES
TEXT.BODY: I.R.E. Financial Corp said it has filed suit against CenTrust Savings Bank <CTSTP> seeking to compel CenTrust to sell I.R.E. the 289,700 shares of Atlantic Federal Savings and Loan Association <ASAL> that are the subject of an option agreement between the parties. The company alleged CenTrust has refused to deliver the shares, claiming that the option had expired. Reuter
